item.description: Let's ride the very flat, shady, scenic Nashua - Ayer Rail Trail (24 miles round trip), stopping for ice cream, looking at the pond, and finishing at the Irish pub in Ayer for refreshments. This is a nice ride because it's impossible to get lost. This rail trail is usually pretty low on traffic. There are wet lands offering some views to enjoy. There's a commuter rail out to Ayer too. See you on sunny Saturday. Just in case, slick surfaces cancel. My mobile number will be sent out on Friday.
item.name: Ride the Nashua - Ayer Rail Trail - All Levels
